Keep in mind the chain isn’t even 2 months old yet.    You all have done a fantastic job to date.    Let’s keep up the positive mentality and keep bringing new people in. 😃

Author: FishyGuts#5085

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content:
I see a lot of eagerness and desire to be bigger and better.   
We will be.   It takes time.  

“The pacific wasn’t sailed in a day.”

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content: Working on a voyage map (road map) as well as a destination ledger (things we’ve accomplished).

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content: A white paper would be pretty simple yes?   I will find time for that this week unless someone is confident and has the skill to do that.   I would greatly appreciate it.

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content: To me.... our biggest hurdle... with a privacy coin used for payments.... is to get the avenue of use laid out.    This means the shop plugin currently under development....  Once we have exchange and price support, the our doors open up for this.   We can also start pushing our coin to more info sites as well with this like CMC coingecko livecoinwatch ...  then in the future mobile wallet will enable further P2P spending.

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content: It is tough to sustain a continually increasing price on a new coin who’s functionality is complete but the avenue of remittance is not.  The onboarding of new pirates and James fantastic referral plan will alleviate much of the lull until we get the above completed.

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content:
I really appreciate everyone’s desire to participate and throw ideas out.   

Do not hesitate to DM me to discuss them.   My gangplank is always down.
